sn55.1:1: At Sāvatthī. There the Blessed One said this:
sn55.1:2: "What are the four?sn.v.343Here, bhikkhus, the noble disciple possesses confirmed confidence in the Buddha thus:[n.319] The formulas of homage to the Buddha, the Dhamma, and the Saṅgha are explicated at Vism 198–1 (Ppn 7:–100). Onaveccappasāda,“confirmed confidence,” see II, n.10.‘The Blessed One is an arahant, perfectly enlightened, accomplished in true knowledge and conduct, fortunate, knower of the world, unsurpassed leader of persons to be tamed, teacher of devas and humans, the Enlightened One, the Blessed One.’
